title: Dog!
description: So you think you know your dog?  Bazza is an easy-going middle-aged college lecturer with a taste for weed, porn, beer and redheads. When he adopts a rescue dog, he sees nothing odd about the animal. Then a Himalayan monk comes to visit, and senses something strange.  Dog is a powerful story of love and loss, sin, redemption and dog mess. Youâ€™ll never see your pet the same way again.
author: Mike  Robbins
